subSections.title: Etymology
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かじ|hhira=かぢ}}

# {{lb|ja|nautical}} the [[rudder]] of a [[boat]] or [[ship]]
# {{lb|ja|nautical|aeronautics}} the [[helm]], [[tiller]], or [[wheel]] of a [[boat]] or [[ship]], or of an [[aircraft]]
# {{lb|ja|figurative}} a [[position]] of [[leadership]] or [[control]]
# {{lb|ja|nautical}} a single [[oar]]-like device attached to the back of a small boat and swept from side to side to propel the boat forward

subSections.title: Derived terms
